title: Add the ability to create conversation shortcuts.

body:
Added the ability to create a shortcut to a conversation. A new option "Add to home screen" will appear in the three-dot menu of a conversation. Clicking it will prompt your launcher to add a shortcut to that conversation to your home screen.

Notable Changes:
- Due to restrictions on how addresses and threadId's need to be passed, a new "entrypoint" activity was created, `ShortcuteLauncherActivity`, which will do threadId lookups and otherwise format to be passed to the ConversationActivity. The backstack is still built as expected.

Special thanks to @leonardehrenfried for getting this started!

**Test Devices**
* [Moto E (2nd Gen), Android 5.1, API 22](https://www.gsmarena.com/motorola_moto_e_(2nd_gen)-6986.php) -- Google Now Launcher
* [Nexus 5X, Android 8.1, API 27](https://www.gsmarena.com/lg_nexus_5x-7556.php) -- Google Now Launcher, Action Launcher, Evie Launcher
* [Google Pixel 2, Android P Beta](https://www.gsmarena.com/google_pixel_2-8733.php) -- Pixel Launcher, Evie Launcher
Was this ever implemented? It would be very useful, in my opinion.
Yes, I've been using it for over 2 years now.
